column4: **My framebruffer is not letting me launch X server; anybody got any ideas?**
has a real problem, ol' hondje spent a good two hours on it and couldn't solve it
post the ones I picked out for you
if no one can help you, I have some dumb ideas
install the fancy drivers
Um, I dunno....apt-get install fglrx-control xorg-driver-fglrx I guess
that's what I did, apt-cache search fglrx
ok great. What does fglrx mean>
I dunno, never had an ATI card
okay thanks. It says 17.9MB!
I'm guessing 'FireGLRadeonXtreme'
stupid ATI folk, naming their architecture with such exciting names
how do I "get" that driver.. or are you just saying that's the name?
Um, my guess is apt-get install fglrx-control xorg-driver-fglrx fglrx-kernel-source
whoops I did the first command you gave me. is that okay?
yeah, just missing the kernel source thiingy
no way
aw, I just wanna'd to say something l33t for once. ;)
in hondje land, we're installing a new driver for your card....we edit xorg.conf AGAIN, and see what happens?
so that took only what, 4 hours worth of messing around?
on the plus side, I learned ya' some sshd and the like
